doc.previous: The Caribbean Netherlands are designated as special municipalities of the Netherlands The islands form a part of the Lesser Antilles Within this island group
doc.after: The islands of the Caribbean Netherlands enjoy a tropical climate with warm weather all year round The Leeward Antilles are warmer and drier than the Windward islands In summer the Windward Islands can be subject to hurricanes
